channel.title: Comments on: Adding column number CSS classes to WordPress widgets

item.title: By: Joerg Niemann
item.dc:creator: Joerg Niemann
item.description: Thanks Steve! That saved me a lot of work. I changed the cnum in 3 column layout to just the widgetcount ($cnum= $my_widget_num). That way I have the classes col1, col2, col3 added to the 3 columns.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Steve! That saved me a lot of work.
I changed the cnum in 3 column layout to just the widgetcount ($cnum= $my_widget_num). That way I have the classes col1, col2, col3 added to the 3 columns.
